post.html:
Exercise


Another exercise, another application. No workshop would be complete without a variation on a to-do list, am I right?

It's your turn to take this for a spin. But, you've got a fun twist that I totally didn't through in so that it's not me just rehashing the previous content when I show you the solution, you're going to do it with the useState hook.
post.markdown:
# **Exercise**
Another exercise, another application. No workshop would be complete without a variation on a to-do list, am I right? It's your turn to take this for a spin. But, you've got a fun twist that I totally didn't through in so that it's not me just rehashing the previous content when I show you the solution, you're going to do it with the `useState` hook.
post.title: Context Api Exercise
